title: Ron Grainer - The Omega Man Soundtrack (2008 reissue)
description:
Here is Ron Grainer's soundtrack to 1971 film The Omega Man. It is an eclectic mix of symphonic, jazz, avant garde and electronic music.

This album was originally released in 2002 by Film Score Monthly in a limited pressing of only three thousand discs. Unfortunately, this torrent does not contain that exact album, but a very similar remastered copy re-released in 2008.

Ron Grainer was best known for composing the Doctor Who theme (as realised by Delia Derbyshire of the BBC Radiophonic Workshop), but also had many other television and film scores to his name, including The Prisoner, Danger Man and Steptoe And Son.

Track listing:

  1. A Summer Place (01:39)
  2. The Omega Man (03:22)
  3. Surprise Party (01:39)
  4. Needling Neville (03:36)
  5. Swinging at Neville's (02:16)
  6. The Spirits Still Linger (04:29)
  7. Where Did Lisa Go? (03:37)
  8. 'Round Midnight (02:18)
  9. Jumped by the Family (02:16)
 10. On the Tumbril (06:05)
 11. Bad Medicine for Richie (02:19)
 12. All Through the Night (03:50)
 13. Zachary Makes His Move (04:50)
 14. Hope Springs Eternal (04:03)
 15. Richie on the Roof (02:02)
 16. Neville Crashes Through (07:11)
 17. Matthias the Victor (05:08)
 18. Dutch Takes Over (03:11)
